## Discussion Materials

### Background

**[Alternative text](https://webaim.org/techniques/alttext/),** aka **alt text**, makes our data visualizations accessible to a broader community. Today's section will focus crafting effective alt text, as well as how to include it when rendering visualizations in reproducible reports, websites, etc. using publishing tools like Quarto.
